name: GKSavedGameListener
desc: A protocol that handles events related to saving game data.

items.name: func player(GKPlayer, hasConflictingSavedGames: [GKSavedGame])
items.desc: Chooses the correct game data from the saved games that contain conflicts.

items.name: func player(GKPlayer, didModifySavedGame: GKSavedGame)
items.desc: Handles when data changes in a saved game file.
